@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Projection with ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_INVOICE'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_INVOICE_P
  as projection on ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_INVOICE
{
  key     BillingDocument,
          CompanyCode,
          CompanyCodeName,
          BillingDocumentType,
          BillingDocumentTypeName,
          SalesOrganization,
          SalesOrganizationName,
          DistributionChannel,
          DistributionChannelName,
          Division,
          DivisionName,
          PayerParty,
          PayerPartyName,
          SoldToParty,
          SoldToPartyName,
          kunre,
          kunre_txt,
          @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
          TotalNetAmount,
          @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
          TotalTaxAmount,
          TransactionCurrency,
          BillingDocumentDate,
          DocumentReferenceID,
          CustomerPaymentTerms,
          CustomerPaymentTermsName,
          IncotermsClassification,
          IncotermsTransferLocation,
          IncotermsVersion,
          CreationDate,
          CreationTime,
          CreatedByUser,
          SDDocumentCategory,
          AccountingTransferStatus,
          AccountingTransferStatusText,
          BillingDocumentIsCancelled,
          CancelledBillingDocument,
          AccountingDocument,
          FiscalYear,
          DocumentNumber,
          // CanceledByOrder
          @ObjectModel.virtualElementCalculatedBy: 'ABAP:ZETR_CL_EXP_CHOOSE_DOCUMENT'
  virtual CanceledByOrderPrj       : abap_boolean,

          @ObjectModel.virtualElementCalculatedBy: 'ABAP:ZETR_CL_EXP_CHOOSE_DOCUMENT'
  virtual CanceledByOrderPrjStatus : abap.char(20)
}
